original_title: Sectoral Oversight Committee on National Security opposes privatization of SLT
original_body_lines: The Sectoral Oversight Committee on National Security has issued recommendations against privatization of Sri Lanka Telecom, citing the possible exposure of matters sensitive to national security.

This was conveyed in a report titled “The Effects of Privatization of Sri Lanka Telecom on National Security”, presented to the parliament by the committee’s chairman MP Sarath Weerasekara today (June 09).
